TEXT.TITLE: LOUISIANA PACIFIC <LPX> TO BUY WALLBOARD PLANT
TEXT.BODY: Louisiana Pacific Corp said it reached a non-binding agreement in principle to buy a gypsum wallboard plant in Seattle from Norwest Gypsum. Purchase price and other details of the agreement were not disclosed. Reuter
